class.name: RandomNumberGenerator
class.brief_description: A class for generating pseudo-random numbers.

method.name: randf
method.description: Generates a pseudo-random float between [code]0.0[/code] and [code]1.0[/code] (inclusive).

method.name: randf_range
method.description: Generates a pseudo-random float between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code] (inclusive).

method.name: randfn
method.description: Generates a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normal_distribution]normally-distributed[/url] pseudo-random number, using Box-Muller transform with the specified [code]mean[/code] and a standard [code]deviation[/code]. This is also called Gaussian distribution.

method.name: randi
method.description: Generates a pseudo-random 32-bit unsigned integer between [code]0[/code] and [code]4294967295[/code] (inclusive).

method.name: randi_range
method.description: Generates a pseudo-random 32-bit signed integer between [code]from[/code] and [code]to[/code] (inclusive).

method.name: randomize
method.description: Setups a time-based seed to generator.

members.member: The seed used by the random number generator. A given seed will give a reproducible sequence of pseudo-random numbers. [b]Note:[/b] The RNG does not have an avalanche effect, and can output similar random streams given similar seeds. Consider using a hash function to improve your seed quality if they're sourced externally. [b]Note:[/b] The default value of this property is pseudo-random, and changes when calling [method randomize]. The [code]0[/code] value documented here is a placeholder, and not the actual default seed.
